verses.verse: Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> with all that he had, <S%H935><s%> and came to Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and offered <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of the night, <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Jacob! <S%H3290><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am."

He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am God, <S%H410><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your father. <S%H1><s%> Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid to go down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> for there I will make <S%H7760><s%> of you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

I will go down <S%H3381><s%> with you into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I will also surely <S%H5927><s%> bring you up <S%H5927><s%> again. <S%H3130><s%> Joseph will <S%H7896><s%> close <S%H3027><s%> your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> from Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> their little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> in the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry him. <S%H5375><s%>

They took <S%H3947><s%> their livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and their goods, <S%H7399><s%> which they had gotten <S%H7408><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>â€” Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and all his seed with him, <S%H2233><s%>

his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, <S%H1323><s%> his daughters, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and he <S%H935><s%> brought all his seed <S%H2233><s%> with him into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and his sons: <S%H1121><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi. <S%H3756><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> Jemuel, <S%H3223><s%> Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> Ohad, <S%H161><s%> Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> Zohar, <S%H6714><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanite woman. <S%H3669><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Er, <S%H6147><s%> Onan, <S%H209><s%> Shelah, <S%H7956><s%> Perez, <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah; <S%H2226><s%> but Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> were Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul. <S%H2538><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> Tola, <S%H8439><s%> Puvah, <S%H6312><s%> Iob, <S%H3102><s%> and Shimron. <S%H8110><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%> Sered, <S%H5624><s%> Elon, <S%H356><s%> and Jahleel. <S%H3177><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah, <S%H3812><s%> whom she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> in Paddan Aram, <S%H6307><s%> with his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Dinah. <S%H1783><s%> All the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> - three. <S%H7969><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad: <S%H1410><s%> Ziphion, <S%H6837><s%> Haggi, <S%H2291><s%> Shuni, <S%H7764><s%> Ezbon, <S%H675><s%> Eri, <S%H6179><s%> Arodi, <S%H722><s%> and Areli. <S%H692><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher: <S%H836><s%> Imnah, <S%H3232><s%> Ishvah, <S%H3438><s%> Ishvi, <S%H3440><s%> Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah: <S%H1283><s%> Heber <S%H2268><s%> and Malchiel. <S%H4439><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> whom Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Leah, <S%H3812><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and these she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> even sixteen <S%H6240><s%> souls. <S%H5315><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s wife: <S%H802><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

To Joseph <S%H3130><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> whom Asenath, <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potiphera, <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On, <S%H204><s%> bore to him. <S%H3205><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Bela, <S%H1106><s%> Becher, <S%H1071><s%> Ashbel, <S%H788><s%> Gera, <S%H1617><s%> Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> Ehi, <S%H278><s%> Rosh, <S%H7220><s%> Muppim, <S%H4649><s%> Huppim, <S%H2650><s%> and Ard. <S%H714><s%>
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were fourteen. <S%H702><s%>
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Dan: <S%H1835><s%> Hushim. <S%H2366><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> Jahzeel, <S%H3183><s%> Guni, <S%H1476><s%> Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> and Shillem. <S%H8006><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> whom Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and these she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were seven. <S%H7651><s%>

All the souls <S%H5315><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who were his direct <S%H3318><s%> descendants, <S%H3409><s%> besides Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives, <S%H802><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were sixty <S%H8346><s%> - six. <S%H8337><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> souls. <S%H5315><s%> All the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were seventy. <S%H7657><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> to show <S%H3384><s%> the way <S%H6440><s%> before him to Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> prepared <S%H631><s%> his chariot, <S%H4818><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> in Goshen. <S%H1657><s%> He presented <S%H7200><s%> himself to him, <S%H5307><s%> and fell on his neck, <S%H6677><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on his neck <S%H6677><s%> a good while. <S%H5750><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Now <S%H6471><s%> let me die, <S%H4191><s%> since <S%H310><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> that you are still <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%>"

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and to his father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> "I will go up, <S%H5927><s%> and speak <S%H559><s%> with Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and will tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H251><s%> 'My brothers, and my father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> who were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> have come to me. <S%H935><s%>

These men <S%H582><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> for they have been keepers of livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and they have brought <S%H935><s%> their flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and their herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all that they have.'
It will happen, <S%H6547><s%> when Pharaoh summons <S%H7121><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> and will say, <S%H4639><s%> 'What is your occupation?'

that you shall say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'Your servants have been keepers <S%H582><s%> of livestock <S%H4735><s%> from our youth <S%H5271><s%> even until now, <S%H1><s%> both we, and our fathers:' that you may dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> for every shepherd <S%H7462><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>"
